test.name: ERP_D_P15x2_Ld30
test.comment: NOTE(bja, 201509) constrain_stress_deciduous_onset is on by default for clm50, but functionality is not exercised by nine day tests, Sean Swenson verified that it is active during 30 day tests.

test.name: ERP_Lm20
test.comment: tests mid-year restart, with the restart file being written in the middle of the first year

test.name: ERP_Lm40
test.comment: tests mid-year restart, with the restart file being written in the middle of the second year

test.name: ERP_Lm54
test.comment: tests mid-year restart, with the restart file being written after more than 2 years, which Sam Levis says is important for testing crop restarts

test.name: ERP_P15x2_D
test.comment: Can be removed once we change the CLM5 default to have more than 5 snow layers (at which point we will be testing 5 layers with CLM45 and more than 5 with CLM5)

test.name: ERS_D_Ld10
test.comment: test transient PFTs (via HIST) in conjunction with changing glacier area

test.name: ERS_Ly5_P60x1
test.comment: Want a multi-year global test of transient crops; also want a multi-year transient restart test. Using P60x1 and ERS rather than ERP to get faster turnaround of this long-running test

test.name: LII_D
test.comment: include one interpolation test involving crop (for now we also want one without glc_mec, although we could drop the requirement of having a non-glc_mec LII test if/when we switch to always using glc_mec)

test.name: LII_D_Ld3
test.comment: include one interpolation test involving glc_mec (we can stop using the spunup testmod once glc_mec cases point to out-of-the-box initial conditions)

test.name: PET_P15x2_D
test.comment: include a test of initInterp from one resolution to another; make it a PET test to exercise the OpenMP directives in initInterp (could be changed to a CROP compset with interp_f19_crop if we had non-buggy initial conditions for crop - i.e., once bug 1753 is resolved and crop initial conditions files are remade)

test.name: SMS_D_Ld3
test.comment: test interpolation of crop to non-crop (also change resolution, but that is not an essential part of this test)

test.name: SMS_D_Ld3
test.comment: test interpolation of non-crop to crop (also change resolution, but that is not an essential part of this test)

test.name: SMS_D_Ly6
test.comment: Want a debug test that tests a number of aspects of transient crops, including a new crop landunit and shifting PCT_CFT

test.name: SMS_Lm1_D
test.comment: nlevsno less than 5 is not important scientifically, but is useful for making sure no code assumes that there are 5 snow layers (because this should result in an array bounds exception); this test can be removed once CLM5 is released and most new branches are based off of CLM5 (which will have a runtime-set number of snow layers, rather than assuming 5 snow layers)... until then, I want this test to catch any new code that assumes 5 snow layers

test.name: SMS_Lm37
test.comment: Long enough test for SMB to be generated in bare land areas; add a month beyond the 3rd year to allow time for CLM to respond to CISM forcing from the 3rd year. (Note: if we had spun-up initial conditions for an IG compset, we could test this with much shorter test, if it also used the glc override options - much of the need for this long test is to allow the snow pack to spin up.)
